India's trusted: India's trusted online destination for premium quality thinners at factory prices. We're here to make thinner buying simple, affordable, and transparent by eliminating middlemen. Whether you're a retailer, paint shop, or industrial buyer, Thinner Mart is designed to serve your needs directly from the source.
Backed by: Backed by the legacy and expertise of Mehta Corporation, a well-established name in the thinner manufacturing industry since 2005. With nearly two decades of hands-on experience, Mehta Corporation brings trust, consistency, and uncompromising quality to this new digital platform.
Thinner Mart was born: Thinner Mart was born out of a simple yet powerful idea. To deliver quality thinners directly to businesses at the best prices. We believe every business, big or small, deserves access to high-quality products without paying a premium.

At Thinner Mart, we strive: At Thinner Mart, we strive to ensure timely and secure delivery of your orders. Please read our shipping and delivery policy carefully.
Orders are processed: Orders are processed and dispatched within 24-48 hours after payment confirmation.
Order cancellation: Order cancellation is not allowed once the order is placed.
For assistance: For assistance, please contact our customer care team.
Free delivery: Free delivery only in selected states & UT. Only in tier-1 tier-2 cities. Please refer the list below.
For areas not eligible: For areas not eligible for free delivery, additional delivery charges apply. We'll send the parcel via transport, and you'll need to pay transport charges directly to the transporter upon delivery (To Pay mode).
Estimated delivery time: Estimated delivery time: 5-7 days, depending on your location. Delivery time may increase for remote or distant areas.
In case of a high volume: In case of a high volume of orders, shipping may be delayed. We will contact you regarding any delays.
Note: Thinner Mart does: Note: Thinner Mart does not cover damage during transport. Please inspect the package upon delivery and report any issues to the transporter immediately.
For any questions or concerns: For any questions or concerns regarding shipping or delivery, please contact us: Email:

There are no returns: There are no returns and no refunds. Only replacements are allowed in eligible cases.
Replacement is accepted: Replacement is accepted only within 15 days after delivery.

The balance product: The balance product must be returned in the original box packing, same as sent by Thinner Mart.

Send the product: Send the product to your nearest transport office.
Do not pay any: Do not pay any amount to the transporter.
Tell them to select: Tell them to select the 'To-Pay' payment method - it's a free replacement.
Once we receive your parcel: Once we receive your parcel, we will verify the quantity.
The same quantity will be shipped: The same quantity will be shipped to you as a replacement.
If your parcel is eligible: If your parcel is eligible for replacement and meets our policies, we'll ship and deliver the replacement products within 7 working days after verification.
The entire replacement: The entire replacement process can take up to 15 working days.
